hadiths.text: Jabir b. Abdullah (Allah be pleased with them) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) saying:If You sell fruits to your brother (and Jabir b. Ahduthh reported through another chain of narrators: If you were to sell fruits to your brother) and these is a stricken with Calamity, it is not permissible for you to get anything from him. Why do you get the wealth of your brother, without jutification?

chapter.eng-name: Waiving Payment in the case of Blight
